messages.title: Protecting Community Life
messages.content: There is a commitment to empowering councils to oppose betting shops; local authorities now have greater powers to reject applications for lap-dancing clubs and we will give councils new powers to oppose gambling licenses if there are too many betting shops operating in a high street.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Empowering councils to oppose betting shops, and give greater powers to reject applications for lap-dancing clubs and gambling licenses to reduce proliferation on high streets.

mentions.candidate: I am confident that this manifesto is the beginning of a process that will introduce substantial legislative changes that will result in residents and councils having the power to tackle betting shop proliferation head on.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am confident that this manifesto is the beginning of a process that will introduce substantial legislative changes that will result in residents and councils having the power to tackle betting shop proliferation head on.

contactInformation.address: Tottenham Labour Party, Unit W57, Grove Business Centre, 560-568 Tottenham High Road, Tottenham N17 9TA

quotes.text: I am confident that this manifesto is the beginning of a process that will introduce substantial legislative changes that will result in residents and councils having the power to tackle betting shop proliferation head on.
